list_definition.definition: (with with someone, about something) to quarrel with (a person) or discuss (something) with a person in a not very friendly way

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Will you children stop arguing with each other about whose toy that is!

list_definition.definition: (with for, against) to suggest reasons for or for not doing something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I argued for/against accepting the plan.

list_definition.definition: (with into, out of) to persuade (a person) (not) to do something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’ll try to argue him into going
He argued her out of buying the dress.
She argued the point very cleverly.
